ygData.subject: Re: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: Huh? I live mainly on the sleepy Drinal server, where there has been little hint of all these high-powered goings on. I ve heard a few things, mainly from
ygData.messageBody:
Huh? I live mainly on the sleepy Drinal server,
where there has been little hint of all these
high-powered goings on. I've heard a few things, mainly from
Everlore, but didn't think it had anything to do with
Norrath in general. I did buy one of those news scrolls
from the new NPC's that popped up everywhere about a
week ago -- do those have anything to do with all of
this?<br><br>Gotta get my Dwarf a magic weapon, I
guess.<br><br>Thanks,<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim<br>12th season rogue<br>Drinal
